about_the_game:
Build a Team of Titans with endless possibilities
With 200 Titans to find and over 300 different moves for them to learn, there's no limit to the number of teams you can build. There are 16 Titan types, each with their own strengths and weaknesses, so effective team building will be paramount.

Explore a diverse region and uncover hidden secrets
Latos boasts all sorts of environments. Rivers, mountains, caves, volcanoes, glaciers, and forests can all be found in this region. Rare Titans flock to different ecosystems, so be sure to explore through all of Latos!

Use tactical turn based strategy to defeat challenging opponents
Decisions and strategy are crucial in this turn based RPG. As you progress through the game, you'll encounter difficult opponents who will put your battling skills to the test.

Enjoy hours of post game content after the story's completion
Your journey doesn't need to end with the story. Post game content includes finding and catching all 200 Titans, opening every treasure chest, defeating master trainers, and catching the Alpha form of every Titan.

name: Team Of Titans

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The evil Mirror Clan holds dominion over the region of Latos. Everyone has lost all hope, except for one. An unlikely hero must build a Team of Titans and bring an end to the reign of tyranny.
